thread.title: 'Epidemic of blindness' on horizon as hours spent staring at screens...
thread.title_full: 'Epidemic of blindness' on horizon as hours spent staring at screens...

title: 'Epidemic of blindness' on horizon as hours spent staring at screens...
text: 'Global epidemic of blindness' on the horizon, experts warn: Hours spent staring at screens 'will rob millions of their sight decades early' High energy light from digital screens is damaging our retinas, a new study says Damage to the retinas - the light-sensitive layer at the back of the eye - is the biggest cause of central blindness Experts say it is now 'clearer than ever' that we are facing a new global epidemic But using a filter over screens can prevent further damage, researchers claim Published: 13:27 GMT, 24 January 2017 | Updated: 14:31 GMT, 24 January 2017 27 shares
